author: NoiselessVolatileLobster
install_msg: PizzaMention has been installed. usage: `[p]pizzamentionset view` to see current settings, or `[p]pizzamentionset word <word>` to change the tracked keyword.
name: PizzaMention
short: Tracks the time since a specific keyword was last mentioned.
description: Tracks how many days, hours, and minutes have passed since a specific keyword was mentioned in the server. Displays the streak in ANSI colored text.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores the configured keyword and the timestamp of the last mention for each guild. It does not store personal user data.
